SOURCES.s_procedure1: START:s_procedure1 DOCTYPE <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"> PROPERTY this table.columns 1 PROPERTY this table.rows 1 PROPERTY this table.centered false PROPERTY this table.border 0 PROPERTY this table.width 100% PROPERTY this table.tdwidth 4% PROPERTY this table.cellpadding 0 PROPERTY this table.className newback2 PROPERTY this table.classNameie newback2 PROPERTY this td1.overflow visible PROPERTY this td1.indivheight 100% RETURN 1
SOURCES.s_procedure2:
START:s_procedure2 HTML
#s_Record1.CUS.NAME label# #s_Record1.CUS.NAME#
#s_Record1.CUS.SURNAME label# #s_Record1.CUS.SURNAME#
#s_Record1.CUS.CARD_NUMBER label# #s_Record1.CUS.CARD_NUMBER#

#s_Record1.CUS.STREET label# #s_Record1.CUS.STREET#

#s_Record1.CUS.BOOK_BORROWED_ID label# #s_Record1.CUS.BOOK_BORROWED_ID#
ENDHTML RETURN 1
SOURCES.s_setProperties:
START:s_setProperties DOCTYPE <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"> PROPERTY this table.columns 1 PROPERTY this table.rows 1 PROPERTY this table.border 0 PROPERTY this table.layout fixed PROPERTY this table.width 100% PROPERTY this table.tdwidth 4% PROPERTY this table.cellpadding 0 PROPERTY this table.className newback2 PROPERTY this table.classNameie newback2 PROPERTY this td1.overflow visible PROPERTY this td1.indivheight 100%
